title: User Registration and Authentication
summary: Implement user account creation and login features
description: Build secure registration and authentication workflows allowing customers to sign up, log in, and manage their profiles. Include email and mobile verification, password encryption, and support for social login options such as Google and Facebook for ease of access.

title: Product Catalog and Search
summary: Create and manage a browsable catalog of products with search and filter capabilities
description: Develop a robust product catalog that supports categorization, tagging, and advanced search options. Implement filtering by price, brand, ratings, and availability. Ensure scalability for large inventories and optimize product data retrieval using efficient indexing.

title: Product Details and Reviews
summary: Provide detailed product pages with customer reviews and ratings
description: Design product detail pages that include high-quality images, specifications, pricing, stock status, and user reviews. Enable customers to add ratings, submit feedback, and view aggregated product ratings to make informed decisions.

title: Shopping Cart and Wishlist
summary: Enable customers to manage selected items before checkout
description: Implement a shopping cart system where users can add, update, or remove items. Include a wishlist feature that allows customers to save products for later. Ensure cart persistence across sessions and devices using secure customer data storage.

title: Checkout and Payment Integration
summary: Implement secure checkout, order summary, and multiple payment methods
description: Build a secure and streamlined checkout process that includes address management, delivery options, and integrated payment gateways. Support credit/debit cards, UPI, net banking, and wallet payments. Ensure compliance with PCI DSS standards for payment security.

title: Order Management and Tracking
summary: Manage order lifecycle and provide customers with real-time tracking updates
description: Develop functionality to process, confirm, and track orders efficiently. Customers should receive order confirmations, shipment details, and delivery updates. Include order cancellation, returns, and refund workflows with integrated notifications.

title: Inventory and Vendor Management
summary: Handle inventory synchronization and vendor coordination
description: Create modules to manage stock levels, supplier details, and procurement. Ensure real-time updates for product availability and integration with vendor systems for restock alerts and automatic updates when new inventory is added.

title: Customer Support and Feedback
summary: Implement a customer service and feedback management system
description: Integrate support features such as live chat, ticketing, and feedback collection. Allow customers to raise queries about orders, shipments, or payments and track resolution status. Incorporate automated FAQs and chatbot support to enhance response time.

title: Marketing and Promotions
summary: Develop tools for managing discounts, coupons, and personalized marketing
description: Implement campaign management features allowing administrators to create and monitor discount codes, seasonal sales, and loyalty programs. Enable personalized offers based on purchase history and user preferences to increase engagement and retention.

title: Analytics and Reporting
summary: Provide business insights and performance reports for better decision-making
description: Design analytics dashboards to track sales performance, customer behavior, and product trends. Include customizable reporting tools for administrators to monitor KPIs such as revenue, conversion rates, and top-selling products.
